terra.syncBackground: Data is being updated in the background
terra.dataUpToDate: All data is up to date
terra.waitForProvider: Wait 5 seconds to sync with provider
terra.confirmDisconnect:
Are you sure you want to disconnect {{provider}}?

This will completely remove the connection and revoke the OAuth token. A new authorization will be required for reuse.
terra.confirmDeauth:
Are you sure you want to completely remove the {{provider}} connection?

This will revoke the OAuth token on the {{provider}} side and delete the record. After this, you can reconnect the device.
terra.clearingTerraSessions: Clearing all sessions on Terra side...
terra.sessionsDeleted: Deleted {{count}} Terra sessions. Now follow these steps before reconnecting.
terra.nextStepsDesc:
1. Clear cookies for whoop.com/oura.com in Safari
2. Log out and log in to the device app
3. Reconnect the device
terra.disconnectedDesc: These devices were previously connected. Click "Activate" for automatic reconnection.
terra.deleteTooltip: Completely delete the authorization token. After this, reconnect the device to resolve sync issues.
terra.connectDeviceDesc: Connect a fitness tracker for automatic data synchronization
terra.timeWarning: After clicking the connect button, complete authorization in the device app within 15 minutes.
terra.step2: Log out and log in again
terra.selectTracker: Select your fitness tracker to connect
terra.resetTooltip: Full reset: clear all stuck sessions before connecting
terra.autoSyncDesc: Your device will sync automatically every few hours
terra.resetExplanation: This action will delete ALL Terra tokens for this provider, including stuck sessions from previous connection attempts.
terra.reason2: Want to start connection from scratch

whoop.syncWillStart: Whoop data will start syncing automatically.

whoopDirect.title: Whoop Direct
whoopDirect.longLoadWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Loading 3 months of data may take several minutes
whoopDirect.integrationInfo: This integration works directly with Whoop API, bypassing Terra. Data is updated every 15 minutes automatically.
whoopDirect.completeAuth: Complete Whoop authorization and return automatically
whoopDirect.allowPopups: Please allow popups for this site
whoopDirect.reopenPage: Reopen the page to see Whoop status
whoopDirect.confirmDisconnect: Are you sure you want to disconnect Whoop?

appleHealth.title: Apple Health Data
appleHealth.description: Upload Apple Health export to automatically import your health metrics
appleHealth.largeFileDesc: File size: {{size}}MB. Processing may take several minutes. Using optimized algorithm for large files.
appleHealth.wrongFormatDesc: Upload a ZIP archive of Apple Health export
appleHealth.processingWarning: Processing large files may take several minutes. Please don't close the page.
appleHealth.howToExport: How to export data from Apple Health:
appleHealth.step4: Wait for the archive to be created and send it to yourself
appleHealth.step5: Upload the received ZIP file here
appleHealth.errorProcessing: Could not process file. Check that it's a valid Apple Health export and try again.

phases.streaming: Streaming processing started for large file...

errors.default: Could not process Apple Health file
errors.storageSizeLimit: File exceeds maximum Storage size. Contact administrator to increase limit.
errors.payloadTooLarge: File too large to upload. Try reducing archive size.
errors.serverError: Server file processing error. Check logs.
errors.fileNotFound: File not found after upload. Please try again.

complete.backgroundProcessing: Data processing is running in background
complete.resultsWillAppear: Processing results will be saved automatically and appear in your metrics.

1.title: DNS Domain Setup
1.description: Create a CNAME record for your subdomain

2.title: Whoop Developer Portal Registration
2.description: Create an app in Whoop Developer Portal

3.title: SSL Certificate Request
3.description: Open a ticket in Terra Support for SSL

4.title: Terra Dashboard Configuration
4.description: Enter Whoop credentials in Terra Dashboard

whoopWizard.enterClientCredentials: Enter Client ID and Client Secret
whoopWizard.dnsAlert: Whoop integration requires your own domain with DNS access
whoopWizard.dnsStep1: Go to DNS panel of your provider (GoDaddy, Cloudflare, etc.)
whoopWizard.dnsStep4: Wait for DNS propagation (10-30 minutes, max 48 hours)
whoopWizard.createAccountWithEmail: Create an account with email and password
whoopWizard.createTeam: Create a Team with your details
whoopWizard.createAppWith: Create an App with the following parameters:
whoopWizard.copyClientCredentials: Copy Client ID and Client Secret
whoopWizard.createTicketWith: Create a ticket with the following text:
whoopWizard.terraResponseTime: Terra Support will respond within 1-2 business days and ask to add additional CNAME records for SSL validation
whoopWizard.testingComplete: Setup complete! Now you can test the connection
whoopWizard.checkDeviceInList: Check that device appears in connected list
whoopWizard.productionApproval: Important: After successful testing, you need to apply for Production Approval in Whoop Developer Portal. The process may take 1-2 weeks.

dataMonitor.loadingDataForDays: Loading data for the last {{days}} days...
dataMonitor.someDataNotUpdated: Some data hasn't been updated for over 2 days. Check device connection.

widgetLoader.timeWarning: After clicking "Start" button, you'll have exactly 5 minutes to complete authorization in {{provider}} app.
widgetLoader.knowCredentials: You know your {{provider}} login and password
widgetLoader.stableConnection: You have a stable internet connection
widgetLoader.loginFirst: If needed, log in to {{provider}} app in browser first
widgetLoader.sessionExpiredTip: Tip: If you see "Session Expired" error, log out and log back in to {{provider}} app, then retry connection.
widgetLoader.sessionExpiredMessage: Authorization session expired. This can happen if authorization took more than 5 minutes.
widgetLoader.sessionExpiredTipShort: Tip: Try logging in to {{provider}} in browser first, then retry connection. Make sure to complete within 5 minutes.
widgetLoader.completeAuthInWindow: Complete authorization in the opened window. If window didn't open, check popup blocker.

healthMonitor.title: Connection Monitor
healthMonitor.syncOutdatedTip: Sync is outdated - click "Sync" in connections section
healthMonitor.problemsDetected: Problems detected - check device status and reconnect if needed

prioritySettings.title: Source Priority Settings
prioritySettings.description: Set priority of data sources for each metric. Sources with higher priority will be used first during aggregation.
